# MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.uint32

**Case**

The size of a 32-bit unsigned integer.

## Declaration

```swift
case uint32
```

## Index types

- **MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.none**: No size. This value should only be used when drawing patches without a control point index buffer.
- **MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType.uint16**: The size of a 16-bit unsigned integer.
